divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend and I were watching tv and she noticed a bright pulsating star through the living room window facing north.We turned off the tv and looked at it with binoculars and it looked like it was made up of multi colored lights.The weird thing is that it looked like a really bright star and mimiced how a star would act.We thought that we might be crazy but when I looked online some one from where we live had seen the same thing a year ago
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Arlington
There were no other sightings in Arlington on or around September 1st 2013
Summary: looks like a pulsating star to the naked eye but when observed with binoculars there seems to be made op of red green and blue lights
